title: Is it possible to change the announcer in league?
body:
I viewed a youtube video that had Rick & Morty as the announcer.
Couldn't figure out how to do this and broke my client.
Can anyone assist :)

replies.body: You can but you have to download a 3rd party thing and change the in-game configuration files. Which is against riot's terms of service. So i would def suggest you dont do it or your account could get banned forever
Unfortunately no as of now, but I hope soon we'll be able to change announcers like how they did it with Gangplank during the Bilgewater event and Aurelion Sol in ARAM before his release.
I would like to know. Current one is annoying.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z-L46woBWMo kind of related, i'd ask there.

Ahh, I have spent way too much money on RP so I definitely don't want to get banned.

Do they look the other way for insignificant things like this or no?
